title: WTT: T202's, T201 Cobb/Crawford,etc. for Graded T206's
author: Dave Thompson

posts.post_title: WTT: T202's, T201 Cobb/Crawford,etc. for Graded T206's
posts.post_content:
I am interested in trading the following graded cards for graded (SGC, PSA) T206's in vg/vgex condition.  Would also consider HOF's or SL's in good graded condition.  Would also sell but prefer trades.  I have had very good success with other Net 54 members in recent transactions. I am interested in selling the balance of the cards that were not previously purchased or traded for.  Prices are noted.  Price includes shipping and insurance.  Scans are available upon request.

T201 - Cobb/Crawford PSA6 - NICE CARD! - $1250

T202 - Elberfeld/Milan #57 PSA5 - SOLD

T202- Cobb/Moriarity #130 PSA4 - TRADED

T202 - Griffith/McBride #101 PSA4 - TRADED

T202 - Bergen/Barger #4 PSA6 - $190

T202 - Marquard/Meyers #83 PSA4 - SOLD

1933 - Tatt00 Orbit - Alexander  SGC50 - $65

1933 - Tattoo Orbit - Foxx SGC40 - TRADED

1939 Play Ball DiMaggio PSA 5 -$600

Thanks for your interest.  I can be reached at [url]davet106@comcast.net[/url]

Dave

ADDED:

T202 Schulte/Sheckard #109  PSA 4 -$75

T202 Fromme/McLean #12  PSA 5 - $100

T202 Egan/Hoblitzel # 119  PSA 4 - $70

[quote name="Dave Thompson" post=862915]I have had very good success with other Net 54 members in recent transactions.[/QUOTE]

Dave and I had a great trade and he was a pleasure to deal with.
I just did a substantial trade with Dave with no prior dealings before making the trade.  He's a very fair and good trading partner (and he's got nice cards:)!).
